name: Got Guts?
description:
"Got Guts?" is a game project I developed for a college assignment. It's an endless runner set in the human body as you the player takes on the roll of heartburn (represented as a flame girl), shooting down and avoiding all necessary threats that are in your way. 

This my is my first 2D game I've made with a limited amount of resources on the free version of Construct 2 where it was developed while all artwork and animations were done on Photoshop. I hope you enjoy the game!!

P.S. Yes, your little flame sidekick is most definitely a Gurren Lagann reference. Can't you tell by those rocking shades???
